effects: 50% chance to counter physical attacks with Holy Retaliation (505030) (max 1 / turn) to caster
name: Holy Retaliation
Holy Retaliation
回擊神聖

desc_short: Add chance of countering with light damage to all enemies when receiving a physical attack
受到物理攻擊時一定機率對全體敵人進行光屬性攻擊反擊
Puede contraatacar con daño de luz a todos los enemigos al recibir un ataque físico
